head.title: All 143 Aboard Die In Bahrain Jet Crash

hedline.hl1: All 143 Aboard Die In Bahrain Jet Crash

block.p: All 143 people aboard a Gulf Air Airbus A320 on a flight from Cairo to Bahrain were killed when the jet crashed in the Persian Gulf after circling and trying to land in Manama. Most of the passengers were from Arab countries, including at least 63 Egyptians.

The cause of the crash was not immediately clear. An air traffic controller at the Bahrain airport said that he saw no sign of trouble and that the plane's crew did not report anything out of the ordinary.
